name: Mystery Case Files: Dire Grove, Sacred Grove Collector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Case Files: Dire Grove, Sacred Grove Collector's Edition
description:
Mystery Case Files: Dire Grove, Sacred Grove Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Big Fish Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Mystery Case Files: Dire Grove, Sacred Grove Collector's Edition on PC.
